title: Jessica Mauboy shows off her ring at the BAZAAR In Bloom Charity Gala
text:
She recently got engaged to her long-term boyfriend Themeli Magripilis during a romantic trip in Greece.

And on Friday, Jessica Mauboy proudly showed off her stunning diamond ring as she attended the BAZAAR In Bloom Charity Gala in Sydney.

The 30-year-old singer ensured her sparkler was the main focus as she placed her hand on her chin while posing on the red carpet.

Shining bright! Jessica Mauboy (pictured) showed off her diamond ring at the BAZAAR In Bloom Charity Gala on Friday

Won't be missed! Jessica ensured her sparkler was the main focus as she placed her hand on her chin while posing on the red carpet

Glamorous: The singer dressed to impress in a figure-hugging pink gown complete with a collar

Jessica dressed to impress in a figure-hugging pink gown complete with a collar.

The former Australian Idol star accessorised her glamorous frock with a pair of heels, silver earrings and a bangle.

She let her natural beauty shine, opting for a neutral palette of make-up and wore her brunette locks in a low bun.

Final touches: Jessica let her natural beauty shine, opting for a neutral palette of make-up and wore her brunette locks in a low bun

Bling: The gorgeous star accessorised her glamorous frock with a pair of heels, silver earrings and a bangle

Pretty in pink: Jessica smiled as she perfected her pose on the red carpet

Jessica's red carpet appearance comes just two days after she revealed that she's set to marry her boyfriend of over 10 years.

Taking to Instagram on Wednesday, she said that they had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece visiting Themeli's family.

'We are so happy. I can’t wait to spend the rest of my life with my best friend. Thank you for all the love. BIG LOVE JM & Themeli,' she wrote.

All smiles: Jessica also posed alongside Marta Dusseldorp (left) shortly after arriving to the event

It's official! Jessica's red carpet appearance comes just two days after she revealed that she's set to marry her boyfriend of over 10 years, Themeli Magripilis

Exciting: On Wednesday, Jessica said that they had gotten engaged during a recent holiday in Greece, visiting Themeli's family

Themeli, a soccer player from the Northern Territory, had reportedly sought approval from his family in Greece before asking Jessica to marry him.

The pair first met on a night out more than a decade ago, and spent seven years in a long-distance relationship before he relocated to Sydney in 2016.

The couple are now living together in Jessica's $1.8 million two-level apartment.
